content.text: Match ends, Leicester City 2, Swansea City 1.
Second Half ends, Leicester City 2, Swansea City 1.
Attempt saved. Ahmed Musa (Leicester City) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Riyad Mahrez.
Offside, Leicester City. Riyad Mahrez tries a through ball, but Daniel Drinkwater is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Riyad Mahrez (Leicester City) left footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Daniel Drinkwater following a fast break.
Corner,  Swansea City. Conceded by Danny Simpson.
Corner,  Swansea City. Conceded by Christian Fuchs.
Foul by Modou Barrow (Swansea City).
Ahmed Musa (Leicester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Hand ball by Christian Fuchs (Leicester City).
Substitution, Swansea City. Oliver McBurnie replaces Jack Cork.
Goal!  Leicester City 2, Swansea City 1. Leroy Fer (Swansea City) header from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Modou Barrow with a cross.
Substitution, Leicester City. Leonardo Ulloa replaces Shinji Okazaki.
Foul by Kyle Naughton (Swansea City).
Shinji Okazaki (Leicester City) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Fernando Llorente (Swansea City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Wes Morgan (Leicester City).
Substitution, Leicester City. Ahmed Musa replaces Marc Albrighton.
Attempt missed. Leroy Fer (Swansea City) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Jefferson Montero.

Corner,  Swansea City. Conceded by Christian Fuchs.
Ki Sung-yueng (Swansea City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Daniel Amartey (Leicester City).
Attempt missed. Leroy Fer (Swansea City) header from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Ki Sung-yueng with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Swansea City. Conceded by Danny Simpson.

Foul by Danny Simpson (Leicester City).
Jefferson Montero (Swansea City) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Offside, Leicester City. Daniel Drinkwater tries a through ball, but Shinji Okazaki is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Jamie Vardy (Leicester City) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Daniel Amartey.
Attempt missed. Wes Morgan (Leicester City) left footed shot from the left side of the six yard box misses to the left. Assisted by Marc Albrighton with a cross following a set piece situation.
Leroy Fer (Swansea City) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.

Attempt missed. Modou Barrow (Swansea City) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Leroy Fer.
Substitution, Swansea City. Ki Sung-yueng replaces Wayne Routledge.
Substitution, Swansea City. Jefferson Montero replaces Gylfi Sigurdsson.
Substitution, Leicester City. Ron-Robert Zieler replaces Kasper Schmeichel because of an injury.
Attempt saved. Shinji Okazaki (Leicester City) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal.
Penalty saved! Riyad Mahrez (Leicester City) fails to capitalise on this great opportunity,  left footed shot saved  in the bottom left corner.
Penalty Leicester City. Shinji Okazaki draws a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty conceded by Jordi Amat (Swansea City) after a foul in the penalty area.
Attempt missed. Gylfi Sigurdsson (Swansea City) left footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Jack Cork.
Goal!  Leicester City 2, Swansea City 0. Wes Morgan (Leicester City) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Robert Huth following a corner.
